original_text: And suddenly, when they had looked round about, they saw no man any more, save Jesus only with themselves.
korean_text: 문득 둘러보니 아무도 보이지 아니하고 오직 예수와 자기들뿐이었더라

sentences.original_text: when they had looked round about
they saw no man any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 아무도 보지 못했으나
